title: How to create new plugin for Lucene
description: Does anyone know what is the best practice or workflow for creating a plugin for Lucene. How do we adapt our system to keep up with new versions of Lucene when it is released? We are modifying Lucene's analysis/querying process to support typed (entity) search. Thanks.

comments.content:
This is not an appropriate use of Lucene's JIRA, we try to reserve the JIRA system for code issues rather than usage questions..

Please ask the question here: java-user@lucene.apache.org

There are other Lucene resources here: https://lucene.apache.org/core/discussion.html
comments.author: Erick Erickson
